mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.subtitle: For over 30 years, we have been training tomorrow's African leaders

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Train, in French, creative executives capable of meeting the challenges of sustainable development in Africa.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become a major player in the training and capacity building of executives in Africa and for Africa.

experience.title: The Senghor Experience
experience.description: A unique educational experience with professional immersion, creativity projects and much more.
